Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Pistons (15-18) are enjoying a recent surge in form and expect to continue to climb up the standings when they host the floundering Charlotte Hornets (7-25) at home on January 4, 2025.
The Pistons will need to navigate the rest of the season without guard Jaden Ivey, who broke his fibula in their victory over the Orlando Magic earlier this week.
The Hornets have battled injuries themselves with a slate of absences impacting team performances this season.
Miles Bridges has been a standout player for the Hornets but the losses keep piling up.
The Detroit Pistons are huge favorites to win.
